title: Matrix Addition and Scalar Multiplication
contentHtml: Matrix addition and scalar multiplication are fundamental operations in linear algebra that allow us to combine matrices and scale their values.
name: Matrix Addition
problemHtml:
Find the result of adding two matrices:

\[\mathbf{A} = \begin{bmatrix} 1 & 2 \\ 3 & 4 \end{bmatrix},\] \[\mathbf{B} = \begin{bmatrix} 0 & 1 \\ -1 & 2 \end{bmatrix}.\]

steps.explanation: We add the corresponding elements of each matrix

intuition: Matrix addition is a way to combine two matrices by adding corresponding elements. This operation is useful when you need to combine information from multiple sources or update the values of a matrix.
